Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14500. I understand that its true value might be subjective, but I am confident that you will appreciate its worth. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
